title: Superior Darkvision
content:
Superior Darkvision Can see in the dark up to 24m.

Superior Darkvision

Can see in the dark up to 24m.

Superior Darkvision is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.

Superior Darkvision Information

Can see in the dark up to 24m.

How to unlock Superior Darkvision

Superior Darkvision can be acquired by: Deep Gnome, Drow, Duergar, Gloom Stalker, Warlock (Devil's Sight Eldritch Invocation
